entry.title: Dry & Dry 6 Packs Premium Standing Moisture Absorbers to Control Excess Moisture for Basements, Closets, Bathrooms, Laundry Rooms -Standing Moisture Absorbers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type:
Price: 15.99

  • Designed to use in closets, basements, cabins, bathrooms, garages, laundry rooms, and other enclosed spaces. Moisture Absorbers, Dehumidifier
  • Freshens room air by eliminating musty odor caused by excess moisture. Protects clothes and items from excess moisture damage. Moisture Absorbers, Dehumidifier
  • Does not dry air extremely to the point to cause damage to plants, furniture, or any household items. Does not emit any toxic gas or fume. Moisture Absorbers, Dehumidifier
  • Using high-purity calcium chloride, it quickly absorbs a large amount of moisture. This makes it possible to dehumidify 4 times more than the box type.
  • 4 TIMES FASTER ABSORPTION THAN MOISTURE BOX TYPES.
  • Only one in this industry. Only one in the U.S
